title: YouTube Video Analysis with Gemini AI
description: Analyze YouTube videos using Google's Gemini AI to extract comprehensive insights, key quotes, and structural analysis.

youtube_url.title: YouTube URL
youtube_url.description: The YouTube video URL to analyze (e.g., https://youtu.be/VIDEO_ID or https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=VIDEO_ID)

use_default_key.title: Use Default Gemini API Key
use_default_key.description: Check this to use the built-in Gemini API key. If unchecked, you must provide your own API key below.

gemini_api_key.title: Your Gemini API Key (Optional)
gemini_api_key.description: Your Google Gemini API key. Only required if 'Use Default Gemini API Key' is unchecked. Get your API key from https://aistudio.google.com/app/apikey

cookies.title: YouTube Cookies (Optional)
cookies.description: Optional: YouTube cookies in Netscape format to bypass bot detection. Export cookies from your browser using extensions like 'Get cookies.txt LOCALLY' or 'Cookie-Editor'. Paste the entire contents of the cookies.txt file here. Required for age-restricted or sign-in protected videos.

use_external_downloader.title: Use External YouTube Downloader
use_external_downloader.description: Use Apify's streamers/youtube-video-downloader Actor instead of yt-dlp. More reliable but requires cloud storage setup.

s3_access_key_id.title: S3 Access Key ID (for external downloader)
s3_access_key_id.description: Required only if using external downloader. AWS S3 access key ID for storing downloaded videos.

s3_secret_access_key.title: S3 Secret Access Key (for external downloader)
s3_secret_access_key.description: Required only if using external downloader. AWS S3 secret access key for storing downloaded videos.

s3_bucket.title: S3 Bucket Name (for external downloader)
s3_bucket.description: Required only if using external downloader. Name of your S3 bucket where videos will be stored.

s3_region.title: S3 Region (for external downloader)
s3_region.description: Required only if using external downloader. AWS region of your S3 bucket (e.g., 'us-west-1').
